0111001010110100 0011001100100010 1 -> sum: 1010010111010111, cout: 0
0111110000110101 0100101110100011 1 -> sum: 1100011111011001, cout: 0
0011100101010111 0010011011011110 1 -> sum: 0110000000110110, cout: 0
1000110000111000 1011111101110110 1 -> sum: 0100101110101111, cout: 1
0100111000110011 1100000111010110 1 -> sum: 0001000000001010, cout: 1
1011000001011111 0100011111001000 1 -> sum: 1111100000101000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
